first_para: Sir Nicholas Barton "Nick" Harvey (born 3 August 1961) is a British Liberal Democrat politician.

full.extract:
Sir Nicholas Barton "Nick" Harvey (born 3 August 1961) is a British Liberal Democrat politician.
He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Devon and was the Minister of State for the Armed Forces from 2010-2012 until losing that position.
full.title: Nick Harvey
